name: Bumper Buddies
description:
Bumper Buddies is a prototype that was completed in under 48 hours for Ludum Dare 41 ~ Combine 2 Incompatible Genres.

I decided to mix two digital games that were big in my youth. How I remember playing the silver ball, challenging the continuous action packed gameplay that is typical for a pinball machine... Blended with the ever so relaxing gameplay a digital pet simulator can provide.

For your pleasure, I present ...

Bumper Buddies !

Use your pinball skills to feed and entertain your Bumper Buddy and don't forget to clean up after he soiled the place, by repeatedly hitting any excrement with well aimed shots!
